meta.content: EmulationStation Desktop Edition is a frontend for browsing and launching games from your multi-platform game collection.

kbd.title: Use the shortcut key <kbd>/</kbd> to start a search

div.h4: Get started with Code Suggestions, available for free during the beta period.
div.div: Code faster and more efficiently with AI-powered code suggestions in VS Code. 13 languages are supported, including JavaScript, Python, Go, Java, and Kotlin. Enable Code Suggestions in your user profile preferences or see the documentation to learn more.

button.class: gl-button btn btn-icon btn-md btn-default btn-default-tertiary toggle-mobile-nav gl-ml-n3 gl-mr-2

div.class: commit-detail flex-list gl-display-flex gl-justify-content-space-between gl-align-items-flex-start gl-flex-grow-1 gl-min-w-0

div.a: (slate-es-de) Added support for the LowRes NX Fantasy Console (lowresnx) game system
